thread.title: BRIEF-Roku Says Shows From Showtime, Fox & More Available Directly In Roku Channel

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Roku Says Shows From Showtime, Fox & More Available Directly In Roku Channel
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Roku Inc:
* ROKU CELEBRATES 10 YEARS OF TV STREAMING WITH FREE PREMIUM CONTENT AND SPECIAL RETAIL OFFERS
* ROKU - SHOWS FROM SHOWTIME, FOX, EPIX, SMITHSONIAN EARTH & MORE AVAILABLE DIRECTLY IN ROKU CHANNEL
* ROKU INC - OFFERING DISCOUNTS ON SELECT STREAMING PLAYERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
